data.title: Chisholm Larsson Gallery
data.meta_description: Chisholm Larsson Gallery has over 60,000 Original Vintage Posters, spanning all genres.
data.text: Blue in the Face is a 1995 American comedy film directed by Wayne Wang and Paul Auster. "Brooklyn Cigar Store is a neighborhood hangout in Brooklyn with Auggie Wren/H.Keitel as center. Some people are interviewed about Brooklyn, spiced up with statistics on Brooklyn."(IMDb) NOTE: Very good with folds.
